description: This is the main entry point for a React application, setting up rendering of the root component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A helper component for highlighting potential problems in an application.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM at the root node.
